mapper.insert: INSERT INTO purchase (basket_num, sub_num, amount) VALUES (#{basket_num}, #{sub_num}, #{amount})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM basket AS b JOIN purchase AS p ON b.basket_num = p.basket_num JOIN subscribe AS s ON p.sub_num = s.sub_num WHERE b.basket_num = #{basketNum}
SELECT p.amount FROM basket AS b JOIN purchase AS p ON b.basket_num = p.basket_num JOIN subscribe AS s ON p.sub_num = s.sub_num WHERE b.basket_num = #{basketNum} and s.price = #{price}
mapper.delete: DELETE p FROM purchase p INNER JOIN subscribe s ON p.sub_num = s.sub_num WHERE s.sub_num = #{sub_num}
mapper.update: UPDATE subscribe SET start_date = now(), end_date = #{endDate}, sub_state = 1 WHERE sub_num = #{sub_num}
